title: FS: Large Lot of T205 Beaters **ALL CARDS SOLD**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Large Lot of T205 Beaters **ALL CARDS SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly low grade cards (with a couple of nicer ones mixed in) as the scans will show. Most of these cards have major condition issues and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

ALL CARDS SOLD - THANKS
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Good way to knock a bunch off the checklist for a low price!  Thanks for looking.
Final price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!

Bump for some updates to the list.  Quite a few still remaining, including one of the least expensive Cy Young T205s that you will see...with a scarce green border!  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] if you'd like any.  Thanks!

Hello,

Do you still have the Collins hlc (the intact card), the Duffy or the Adkins?

Thanks,

Michael
